name: JETT: The Far Shore - Given Time
summary: Given Time is a brand new campaign for JETT: The Far Shore available for free on January 31st. This new campaign takes place 3 years after the events of the original campaign's ending. As Mei arises from torpor into a mostly hibernating Ground Control, there are new whispers from the wyld to seek out and unravel, this time, alone.
